title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement: Technology-Pedagogy Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of microlearning content accessible via smartphones and real-time survey functionalities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the political and ethical implications of educational technology and incorporate them into instructional design.
Learners can establish strategies for effectively applying mathematics teaching methods in limited digital environments.
Learners can monitor learner responses in real time using mobile-based formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
